subtitle:
1 00:00:00,000 --> 00:00:04,900 Tē-it khò, Siaⁿ-bó: Cha̍p-peh jī.
Lesson One, Initials: Eighteen Characters. 2 00:00:10,844 --> 00:00:08,200 Lán ùi thán-hoâiⁿ ê seng tòe góa liām chi̍t piàn.
Let's follow the horizontal rows and read with me once first. 3 00:00:15,059 --> 00:00:15,500 p, ph, b, m. 4 00:00:24,602 --> 00:00:32,500 t, th, l, n. 5 00:00:33,604 --> 00:00:36,200 k, kh, g, ng, h. 6 00:00:43,764 --> 00:00:51,500 ch, chh, j, s. 7 00:00:52,216 --> 00:00:53,500 Lêng-siaⁿ-bó.
Zero Initial. 8 00:00:53,602 --> 00:00:57,500 Lêng-siaⁿ-bó ê ì-sù, tiō-sī kóng bô siaⁿ-bó ê ì-sù.
The meaning of "Zero Initial" is that there is no initial consonant. 9 00:00:58,192 --> 00:01:02,000 Lán khòaⁿ hun-sek. Lán kā hun-chò sì pō͘-hūn.
Let's look at the analysis. We divide it into four parts. 10 00:01:04,945 --> 00:01:11,000 Tē-it pō͘-hūn kap tē-jī pō͘-hūn, sī hun bô-sàng-khùi kap ū-sàng-khùi ê hun-pia̍t.
Parts 1 and 2 distinguish between non-aspirated and aspirated sounds. 11 00:01:11,096 --> 00:01:14,300 Tī chia, lí ē-tàng khòaⁿ bô-sàng-khùi ê pō͘-hūn.
Here, you can see the non-aspirated part. 12 00:01:14,300 --> 00:01:16,500 lán tò-pêng téng liām tò lo̍h-lâi
Let's read down from the left side. 13 00:01:16,599 --> 00:01:19,500 p, t, k, ch, chit sì im.
p, t, k, ch, these four sounds. 14 00:01:27,336 --> 00:01:32,200 Chit sì im āu-piah, lán kā ke chi̍t-ê "h", i tō piàn-chò ū-sàng-khùi.
Behind these four sounds, if we add an "h", they become aspirated. 15 00:01:32,200 --> 00:01:34,500 Lán khòaⁿ tē-jī choā.
Let's look at the second column. 16 00:01:34,400 --> 00:01:41,800 ph, th, kh, chh. 17 00:01:42,097 --> 00:01:47,700 Tē-it choā kap tē-jī choā, lán chò-hóe lâi liām khòaⁿ-māi leh,
Column one and column two, let's read them together, 18 00:01:47,700 --> 00:01:51,400 ū-sàng-khùi kap bô-sàng-khùi ê hun-pia̍t tī tó-ūi.
to see where the distinction between aspirated and non-aspirated lies. 19 00:01:51,442 --> 00:01:52,800 p, ph 20 00:01:56,292 --> 00:01:59,500 t, th 21 00:02:00,675 --> 00:02:03,657 k, kh 22 00:02:04,980 --> 00:02:08,500 ch, chh 23 00:02:09,860 --> 00:02:13,600 Koh-lâi khòaⁿ tē saⁿ choā kap tē sì choā.
Next, let's look at the third column and fourth column. 24 00:02:13,700 --> 00:02:19,500 Tē saⁿ choā sī bô-phīⁿ-im, tē sì choā ū-phīⁿ-im.
The third column is non-nasal, the fourth column is nasal. 25 00:02:19,500 --> 00:02:23,000 Ū-phīⁿ-im ê pō͘-hūn, lí bān-it nā hoat bē chhut-lâi
For the nasal part, if you happen to be unable to pronounce it, 26 00:02:22,900 --> 00:02:26,000 Lí chiàu tē saⁿ choā bô-phīⁿ-im án-ne liām
you can follow the non-nasal pronunciation of the third column, 27 00:02:27,000 --> 00:02:30,500 phīⁿ-khang sió kā tē--leh, i tō piàn-chò ū-phīⁿ-im eh
and slightly press your nose, and it will become a nasal sound. 28 00:02:31,100 --> 00:02:35,500 Lán lâi khòaⁿ tē saⁿ choā. b.
Let's look at the third column (row 1). b. 29 00:02:35,700 --> 00:02:39,400 Tē sì choā sī m.
The fourth column (row 1)is m. 30 00:02:39,400 --> 00:02:43,500 tē saⁿ choā. l.
Third column (row 2), l. 31 00:02:44,497 --> 00:02:46,500 Tē sì choā sī n.
The fourth column (row 2) is n. 32 00:02:48,050 --> 00:02:49,500 tē saⁿ choā. g.
Third column (row 3). g. 33 00:02:50,625 --> 00:02:52,600 Tē sì choā sī ng.
The fourth column (row 3) is ng. 34 00:02:54,726 --> 00:02:55,500 Koh-lâi sī j
Next is j. 35 00:02:56,434 --> 00:03:02,000 lâi, Góa liām chi̍t piàn: b, m.
Come, I will read it once: b, m. 36 00:03:02,822 --> 00:03:13,000 l, n, g, ng, j 37 00:03:14,086 --> 00:03:18,500 Chhun--ê iáu nn̄g jī, sī h kap s.
The remaining two characters are h and s. 38 00:03:18,500 --> 00:03:27,480 Lóng-chóng cha̍p-peh im. Khàu-tiāu lêng-siaⁿ-bó, chhun cha̍p-chhit im.
There are eighteen sounds in total. Subtracting the zero initial, seventeen remain. 39 00:03:27,500 --> 00:03:32,374 Siaⁿ-bó pún-lâi sī bô-siaⁿ.
Initials originally have no sound. 40 00:03:32,800 --> 00:03:38,488 Á bô-siaⁿ chin pháiⁿ kà, só͘-í su-iàu ūn-bó lâi hoat-siaⁿ, án-ne ta̍k-ke chiah thiaⁿ ū.
And no sound is difficult to teach, so vowels are needed to vocalize. 41 00:03:38,883 --> 00:03:44,060 Lán chit-má kā siaⁿ-bó āu-piah kā ke chi̍t jī "a".
Now, let's add the letter "a" behind the initials. 42 00:03:44,218 --> 00:03:47,727 Lán thàn-ti̍t, tùi tē it choā, tē jī choā, tē saⁿ choā,
We follow vertically, from the 1st, 2nd, 3rd columns, 43 00:03:48,191 --> 00:03:52,100 tē sì choā, tē gō͘ choā, sūn-sī lâi liām.
4th and 5th columns, reading in order. 44 00:03:51,675 --> 00:04:01,016 pa, ta, ka, cha, a. 45 00:04:01,605 --> 00:04:09,733 pha, tha, kha, chha 46 00:04:10,349 --> 00:04:17,979 ba, la, ga, ja 47 00:04:19,025 --> 00:04:29,280 ma, na, nga, ha, sa 48 00:04:31,424 --> 00:04:33,335 bô sàng-khùi, kap ū sàng-khùi hun-pia̍t.
Distinction between non-aspirated and aspirated. 49 00:04:33,309 --> 00:04:34,000 tē 1 chōa kap tē 2 chōa.
Column 1 and Column 2. 50 00:04:34,822 --> 00:04:41,921 pa, pha, ta, tha 51 00:04:42,321 --> 00:04:49,837 ka, kha, cha, chha 52 00:04:49,746 --> 00:04:51,804 tē 3 chōa, tē 4 chōa.
Column 3 and Column 4. 53 00:04:51,903 --> 00:04:53,300 bô phīⁿ-im, kap ū phīⁿ-im.
Non-nasal and nasal. 54 00:04:53,734 --> 00:05:01,097 ba, ma, la, na 55 00:05:01,754 --> 00:05:07,217 ga, nga, ja.
ga, nga, ja. 56 00:05:07,927 --> 00:05:12,328 chòe-āu, ha, sa.
Finally, ha, sa. 57 00:05:14,035 --> 00:05:18,373 Siaⁿ-bó āu-piah ka ke ūn-bó "e".
Add the vowel "e" after the initial. 58 00:05:21,467 --> 00:05:26,447 tē 1 chōa, tē 2 chōa, chò-hóe liām.
tē 3 chōa, tē 4 chōa, chò-hóe liām.
Horizontally, column 1 and Column 2, read together.
Column 3 and Column 4, read together. 59 00:05:29,623 --> 00:05:36,624 pe, phe, te, the 60 00:05:36,699 --> 00:05:47,714 ke, khe, che, chhe, e 61 00:05:47,987 --> 00:05:56,589 be, me, le, ne 62 00:05:57,448 --> 00:06:09,174 ge, nge, je, he, se 63 00:06:10,000 --> 00:06:14,957 Siaⁿ-bó āu-piah ka ūn-bó "i".
Add the vowel "i" after the initial. 64 00:06:15,038 --> 00:06:27,675 pi, phi, ti, thi, ki, khi 65 00:06:28,119 --> 00:06:42,332 chi, chhi, i, bi, mi, li, ni. 66 00:06:42,838 --> 00:06:53,233 gi, ngi, ji, hi, si 67 00:06:54,000 --> 00:07:07,000 Siaⁿ-bó āu-piah ka ūn-bó "o͘ ". Chù-ì chit-ê "o͘ ",
chiàⁿ-chhiú-pêng bīn-téng ke chi̍t tiám.
Add vowel "o͘ ". Note this "o͘ ", a dot is added on the top right. 68 00:07:07,000 --> 00:07:20,754 po͘, pho͘, to͘, tho͘, ko͘, kho͘ 69 00:07:20,466 --> 00:07:31,076 cho͘, chho͘, o͘, bo͘, mo͘ 70 00:07:31,677 --> 00:07:38,702 lo͘, no͘, go͘, ngo͘ 71 00:07:38,979 --> 00:07:45,012 jo͘, ho͘, so͘ 72 00:07:45,100 --> 00:07:48,200 Ke "u".
Add "u". 73 00:07:48,200 --> 00:07:55,896 pu, phu, tu, thu 74 00:07:56,884 --> 00:08:05,307 ku, khu, chu, chhu, u 75 00:08:05,805 --> 00:08:13,417 bu, mu, lu, nu. 76 00:08:13,510 --> 00:08:22,790 gu, ngu, ju, hu, su 77 00:08:23,000 --> 00:08:26,000 ke "o".
Add "o". 78 00:08:26,460 --> 00:08:34,389 po, pho, to, tho 79 00:08:34,995 --> 00:08:44,348 ko, kho, cho, chho, o 80 00:08:44,431 --> 00:08:56,480 bo, mo, lo, no, go, ngo 81 00:08:56,576 --> 00:09:04,430 jo, ho, so
